Name: Mezcal Margarita
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: A smokin' Margarita. Depending on your palate, you may want to vary the amount of agave syrup – from 2.5ml or even no agave syrup for dry palates to as much as 7.5ml for sweeter palates.
Nutrition: One serving of Mezcal Margarita contains 163 calories
